description: Used to set the [base IRI](https://www.w3.org/TR/rdf11-concepts/#dfn-base-iri) against which to resolve those [relative IRI references](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3987#section-6.5) which are otherwise interpreted relative to the document. This keyword is described in [ยง 4.1.3 Base IRI](https://www.w3.org/TR/json-ld11/#base-iri).
